name: Fox Adventures (PaoloHitoshi)
description:
A small fox lives calmly in the woods, but can he mantain it?

Play as a little fox, as he tries to pass through the woods he lives in, collecting gems, cherries, facing wild animals, platforming and a mysterious enemy!

This project is a simple one, just to try and become a better programmer, so all the assets, aside from the scripts, are free for use.

Has some little bugs, so comment some feedbacks and bugs that you find for me to practice!

And finally, if you can, donate so I can keep working with games!

Fox Adventures is available for Windows!

How to play
  • Pause: Escape.
  • Movement(Left and Right): AD .
  • Jump: Spacebar.
  • Advance the Dialogue: Left Mouse Button.
Credits
  • Paolo: Programming.
  • Art, sprites, scenery and everything else is Free Assets found in Unity Asset Store.
  • Sound Effects: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style.
  • Level Music (Retro Forest): https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6.
  • Menu Music (8 bit menu): https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6.
